head.b:skin:
/* ----------------------------------------------- Blogger Template Style Name: every island in the world Design by: http://redrice.io ----------------------------------------------- */
/* Variable definitions ==================== <Variable name="bgcolor" description="Page Background Color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"> <Variable name="textcolor" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#333" value="#A5A8B2"> <Variable name="linkcolor" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#58a" value="#A5A8B2"> <Variable name="pagetitlecolor" description="Blog Title Color" type="color" default="#666" value="#666666"> <Variable name="descriptioncolor" description="Blog Description Color" type="color" default="#999" value="#999999"> <Variable name="titlecolor" description="Post Title Color" type="color" default="#c60" value="#cc6600"> <Variable name="bordercolor" description="Border Color" type="color" default="#ccc" value="#cccccc"> <Variable name="sidebarcolor" description="Sidebar Title Color" type="color" default="#999" value="#999999"> <Variable name="sidebartextcolor" description="Sidebar Text Color" type="color" default="#666" value="#666666"> <Variable name="visitedlinkcolor" description="Visited Link Color" type="color" default="#999" value="#A5A8B2"> <Variable name="bodyfont" description="Text Font" type="font" default="normal normal 100% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif" value="normal normal 100% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif"> <Variable name="headerfont" description="Sidebar Title Font" type="font" default="normal normal 78% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif" value="normal normal 78% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif"> <Variable name="pagetitlefont" description="Blog Title Font" type="font" default="normal normal 200% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif" value="normal normal 200% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif"> <Variable name="descriptionfont" description="Blog Description Font" type="font" default="normal normal 78% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif" value="normal normal 78% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif"> <Variable name="postfooterfont" description="Post Footer Font" type="font" default="normal normal 78% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif" value="normal normal 78% PT Serif, Georgia, Serif"> <Variable name="startSide" description="Side where text starts in blog language" type="automatic" default="left" value="left"> <Variable name="endSide" description="Side where text ends in blog language" type="automatic" default="right" value="right"> */

section.p: Hello, my name is Anna. This blog is about all the beautiful islands around the world.
My big dream is to receive postcards sent from every island in the world (at least those that have a postbox). If you would like to help me, please contact me at letters.from.islands@gmail.com.
